channel.title: Comments on: Tricky launches Brown Punk record label

item.title: By: Relab Music
item.dc:creator: Relab Music
item.description:
Relab Remix Competitions - Tricky, Ca$his, Ghislain Poirier
Jimmy Proximity is proud to present the official beta launch of Relab at www.relabmusic.com.
What is Relab? It's a music remix platform that lets you remix music, freely publish it on social networks, get discovered as a remixer and even get paid. Relab brings you the best remixable tracks from top international artists. It's also a destination to hear the hottest new remixes. You can even create a playlist of your favorite Relab remixes on Facebook with our Relab Music Application.
Remix Competitions running right now: Ca$his - This is the Gang (Shady Records/ Interscope) Ghislain Poirier - Blazin' (Ninja Tune) Tricky - Council Estate (Domino Records)
Relab Music Remix. Get played. Get Paid. www.relabmusic.com
-----Please find attached the official Relab press release
-----Press Kit: www.relabmusic.com/press
Thank you for your time.
Gracia Jalea Promotions Manager Jimmy Proximity Inc. 120 McGill, suite 202 Montreal, Quebec H2Y 2E5 Tel.: 514-448-9388 Fax: 514-313-5333 Email: gracia@jimmyproximity.com
item.content:encoded:
Relab Remix Competitions – Tricky, Ca$his, Ghislain Poirier

Jimmy Proximity is proud to present the official beta launch of Relab at http://www.relabmusic.com/.

What is Relab?
It’s a music remix platform that lets you remix music, freely publish it on social networks, get discovered as a remixer and even get paid. Relab brings you the best remixable tracks from top international artists. It’s also a destination to hear the hottest new remixes. You can even create a playlist of your favorite Relab remixes on Facebook with our Relab Music Application.

Remix Competitions running right now:
Ca$his – This is the Gang (Shady Records/ Interscope)
Ghislain Poirier – Blazin’ (Ninja Tune)
Tricky – Council Estate (Domino Records)

Relab Music
Remix. Get played. Get Paid.
http://www.relabmusic.com/
